::Firearm::

Firearm's eyes widen. He couldn't believe what she had just asked 
him! He catches up to her, putting a hand on her shoulder.

"Look, even if we don't get Striker back, there are many other things 
to live for in the world, you shouldn't give up. But we'll get 
Striker back, don't worry."

He walks out of the room, "Now follow me, I'll show you to some 
quarters."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::Spears::
> 
> Sher mind went realling. She could see flashes of her and Striker 
> walking down the halls of the Ark together. She saw Striker holding 
> her close and looking into his eyes. 
> 
> Now all she could see was the fact that he was gone. She lifted her 
> head and looked at Firearm. "Will you do me a favor...if we can't 
get 
> Striker back.... shoot me...I won't want to live if he's not with 
me."
> She got up and walked towards the door. She was walking in a half 
> daze. She really wasn't even thinking about what she was saying. It 
> was her broken spark rambling on.  She walked to the door, with 
tears 
> still running down her cheeks.
